<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;Caller : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#ac54dd04d6e441d1b72195477e5bc1909">Node</a>-&gt;Callers)</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Recursive helper to trim contexts and create metadata nodes.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Caller should have pushed Node&#39;s loc to MIBCallStack. Doing this in the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// caller makes it simpler to handle the many early returns in this method.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> CallStackTrie::buildMIBNodes(CallStackTrieNode &#42;Node, LLVMContext &amp;Ctx,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><Highlight kind="normal">                                  std::vector&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt; &amp;MIBCallStack,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><Highlight kind="normal">                                  std::vector&lt;Metadata &#42;&gt; &amp;MIBNodes,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><Highlight kind="normal">                                  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> CalleeHasAmbiguousCallerContext) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Trim context below the first node in a prefix with a single alloc type.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Add an MIB record for the current call stack prefix.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/memprof/#a89184869fe3acb3e39f0bfcb98378676">hasSingleAllocType</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#ac54dd04d6e441d1b72195477e5bc1909">Node</a>-&gt;AllocTypes)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><Highlight kind="normal">    std::vector&lt;ContextTotalSize&gt; ContextSizeInfo;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><Highlight kind="normal">    collectContextSizeInfo(Node, ContextSizeInfo);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><Highlight kind="normal">    MIBNodes.push&#95;back(<a href="#a7cbecc17bbb64783431627bcf1f433c7">createMIBNode</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><Highlight kind="normal">        Ctx, MIBCallStack, (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a230980cf62b697d22ffdda32f6118e27">AllocationType</a>)<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#ac54dd04d6e441d1b72195477e5bc1909">Node</a>-&gt;AllocTypes, ContextSizeInfo));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We don&#39;t have a single allocation for all the contexts sharing this prefix,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// so recursively descend into callers in trie.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#ac54dd04d6e441d1b72195477e5bc1909">Node</a>-&gt;Callers.empty()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NodeHasAmbiguousCallerContext = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#ac54dd04d6e441d1b72195477e5bc1909">Node</a>-&gt;Callers.size() &gt; 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> AddedMIBNodesForAllCallerContexts = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;Caller : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#ac54dd04d6e441d1b72195477e5bc1909">Node</a>-&gt;Callers) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><Highlight kind="normal">      MIBCallStack.push&#95;back(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/pdb/#a33e853ec74d48b1340d1d4bae772d30ba14e7dd71a82eb3c2500ac2687efef82b">Caller</a>.first);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><Highlight kind="normal">      AddedMIBNodesForAllCallerContexts &amp;=</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><Highlight kind="normal">          buildMIBNodes(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/pdb/#a33e853ec74d48b1340d1d4bae772d30ba14e7dd71a82eb3c2500ac2687efef82b">Caller</a>.second, Ctx, MIBCallStack, MIBNodes,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266"><Highlight kind="normal">                        NodeHasAmbiguousCallerContext);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="267"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Remove Caller.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268"><Highlight kind="normal">      MIBCallStack.pop&#95;back();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (AddedMIBNodesForAllCallerContexts)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="271"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We expect that the callers should be forced to add MIBs to disambiguate</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the context in this case (see below).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(!NodeHasAmbiguousCallerContext);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="276"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="277"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If we reached here, then this node does not have a single allocation type,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="278"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// and we didn&#39;t add metadata for a longer call stack prefix including any of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Node&#39;s callers. That means we never hit a single allocation type along all</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="280"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// call stacks with this prefix. This can happen due to recursion collapsing</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="281"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// or the stack being deeper than tracked by the profiler runtime, leading to</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="282"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// contexts with different allocation types being merged. In that case, we</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="283"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// trim the context just below the deepest context split, which is this</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="284"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// node if the callee has an ambiguous caller context (multiple callers),</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// since the recursive calls above returned false. Conservatively give it</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="286"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// non-cold allocation type.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="287"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!CalleeHasAmbiguousCallerContext)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="288"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="289"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::vector&lt;ContextTotalSize&gt; ContextSizeInfo;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="290"><Highlight kind="normal">  collectContextSizeInfo(Node, ContextSizeInfo);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="291"><Highlight kind="normal">  MIBNodes.push&#95;back(<a href="#a7cbecc17bbb64783431627bcf1f433c7">createMIBNode</a>(Ctx, MIBCallStack, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a230980cf62b697d22ffdda32f6118e27ad814aa38fbac7f6d03b30741366aae56">AllocationType::NotCold</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="292"><Highlight kind="normal">                                   ContextSizeInfo));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00293" /><CodeLine lineNumber="293"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
